title: iKidiki Slime Making Kit for Girls Boys, Toys for 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 Year Old Girls Boys Gifts Birthday Galaxy Slime Kit 6-12 Year Old Girl Boy Gifts Magic Potions Making Kit Children Fluffy Slime
features: 【Magic Potion & Galactic Slime Making Kit】What will happen when a witch's magical “magic potion” meets a “galactic slime”? The Magic Galactic Slime Set (77 PCS) is designed for making fluffy and soft slime. There are 6 colors of Pearl Powder, Snow Powder*1, Glow Powder*1, Glue*1, Activator Powder*1, Colorful Foam Balls*2, Colorful Pieces*4, Colorful Glitter*4, Planet Beads*3, Moon*1, Stars*1, Clover*1, Bat*1, Crystals*1, Eyes*1, Owl*1, Unicorn*1, Spider*10, Snake*10 to choose from!

【Improve parent-child relationship】Slime making can fulfill the DIY art needs of adults and children. Increase parent-child interaction time and cultivate parent-child emotions. Slime set are the perfect activity to spend DIY creative time at home and a stress relieving toy[★1.5mm String: use the string to turn magic potions into necklaces with lucky clovers/stars/moons or colorful fairy pendant bottles into lucky charms, bringing health, happiness and good luck to your kids' magical adventures]

【DIY 7 Magic Potion Slimes - Imagination and Sensory Play】Cute wizards can use the “Witch Bucket” and “Fairy Magic Wand” to make 7 kinds of fluffy slime magic potion bottles, discover hundreds of kinds of magic slime, feel the world of the Galaxy Universe, and let kids learn through imaginative play, unleash their creativity and develop their Hand-eye coordination[★22 Bottle Stickers: Some blank label stickers to keep them ready to record magic moments!]

【Safe & Non-Toxic】All Galactic Magic Slime and accessories are made of non-toxic and high quality materials, which are safe for adults and children to use. We also prepared 6 airtight containers (110ml Large *3, 50ml Small *3), 7 magic potion bottles (Style: Star, Heart, Large/Small Round Bottle) and 1 witch bucket for storing the slime and preventing it from drying out. These containers are washable and reusable. Recommended for Kids ages 6+

【Perfect Galaxy Magic Slime Handmade Gift for Kids】An awesome slime set for boys and girls aged 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 years old, and a perfect gift for any child who loves slime sets and wants to explore their creativity. It makes a great gift for birthdays, Halloween, Christmas, Easter, school rewards, party favors and any occasion, providing hours of fun and entertainment

【Magic Galaxy Charms - Glitter】Place spiders and snakes in your awesome slime and store in clear magic potion bottles. Make your favorite magic galaxy themed slime crafts, add glitter, slimes glow in the dark!

【Hundreds of Galaxy Slime Possibilities】Make a variety of fun slimes such as cloud slime, butter slime, glitter slime, metallic colored slime, soft slime, and glow-in-the-dark slime. In addition, adding clay gives the slime even more color. Hundreds of possible slime combinations are waiting for you to discover
★Note：It is correct that the activator bottle is powder when you receive it, you need to add warm water to make it fully dissolve into activator solution
★WARNING: Children under 6 years old with parental supervision/accompanying
